name: Rocket Hamster!
description:
Meet the first experiment to launch a hamster to the moon!

Gary is your average hamster. He does what all hamsters do. Eat. Sleep. Poo. And wait to be picked by the great and powerful hands. Today was Bobby's day to be picked.

Make sure to get Garyto the moon safely!

note: this feature is not yet a part of this game, Soon™

Changelog:

- Added planes (cannot be seen, trying to fix that...

- Not a lot else, bug fixes, accidental bug implementations...

Note from the developer (me)

This isn't particularly important, but it was something I wanted to add, for the sake of adding it. The source code of this game will be going up onto github. Why? Well, I personally believe that games should be open-sourced, unless there's some secret lighting system intended for your games only or anything along those lines, games have no reason to really be closed source other than discretion of the developer. That's their choice. But once this game is in a decently not prototyped state I will upload the source and leave a link here. Thanks for reading if you did. Enjoy!

- mixedissmiling
